One of my all time favorites. Nothing comes close when it comes to action puzzle games.
No matter how many times I play through this game, no matter what platform, I eventually come back. Portal 2 is a mastercraft of storytelling, gameplay, and level design.

This game is absolutely amazing! The puzzles are challenging but not too challenging to the point where you rage quit, and there's lots of community made levels that are fantastic. Portal 2 is a very good game like almost all of Valves games! The soundtrack is breathtaking it makes you feel almost like your in the game.
One of the best video games of all time.
Pretty fun game. Good campaign (even better if you played portal 1) and fun to play co-op levels with friends, and Jpays22.
good game. im reinstalling it now on my d drive and i cant wait to play it again
Bu oyunda 2 kişi olabilirsiniz: mal arkadaş ve her şeyi yöneten arkadaş. Mal arkadaş iseniz rahat rahat oyunun keyfini çıkarın. Eğer yönetiyorsanız, kanser olmaya hoş geldiniz.
If this is how I will have to fight AI in the future, I'm prepared
Idk man I just think Wheatley is neat

En este juego solo tenemos UN arma y aun asi es uno de los juegos mas innovadores y divertidos de la historia. La secuela del primer portal (un juego que ya era muy bueno, aunque muy corto) no solo supo estar a la altura del primero, sino incluso superarlo y hasta llegar a ubicarse tranquilamente entre los mejores juegos de la historia (segun muchisimos TOP 100 de juegos) realmente no importa a quien le preguntes, todos amaron este juego,  mucho mas grande, entretenido y desafiante que el primero. La primera vez que lo jugue no podia creer que pudieran existir juegos tan buenos. Necesitamos una tercera entrega sin duda. PLUS: ademas una vez que te pasas el juego es increible jugar el modo cooperativo, sin duda el doble de diversion, junto a tu amigo, amiga, novio o novia! Hermosos momentos pase con este jueguito.
Finally got around to playing these games after hearing about them for a long time, definitely worth it.
Really good game. Not better than Portal 1, but really good. IMO, On-Par with Minecraft.
Ich finde das ist ser cool und ich kann es weiter empfehlen joa das ist ser cool
great game, i love the lemons skit, and the potato joke. overall a great game

The portal games are among my favorites of all time -- they are ancient, by this point, but i still replay them occasionally out of nostalgia and from the sheer delight of the humor throughout. Highly recommended.

the graphics are surprisingly good for a 2011 game and the story is really well thought out, the game is also much longer than the original and is one of the few games where the sequel is better than the original. The characters are all good and likeable and the concept of portals is refined even more

playing it again in 2021, bring on pure nostalgia, i was surprised of the details in the game although it's came out 10 years ago still feels like a new game,
i'll be the first buyer if the part 3 comes out
100/10

big black african american fellow testicles
One of the best games I've played.

Remember how the world was supposed to end and all the good Christians would get raptured back after this game came out?
How Jesus would come down from Heaven to finally banish Satan and the unrepentant sinners to Hell and those of us who truly lived as Christly a life as we can would be ushered into a new Heaven and Earth?
A time before Facebook was evil, when Google didn't sell out to China and thus was nowhere close to creating the modern dystopia?
Where the 80s predicted that competent but selfish white men in suits would try to gain dominance over society, but it turns out that the mob of folks that can't figure out what to identify as are the ones shoving the dystopia down our throats?
A world that wasn't aware of Zoe Quinn yet?
The gays were asking to not be hated instead of forcing people to bake the cake?
The pronoun acronym was just 4 letters and nobody took people claiming to be wolves trapped in human bodies?
10 years ago.
Cyberpunk 2077 hadn't even been announced yet.
I mean, I played this while in high school.
I lost my faith, graduated high school, graduated college, had a career, got blacklisted, went into a suicidal depression, started working on myself, got better, and then refound my faith, met a girl, lost the girl, and just- I mean-
It's been ten years, you know. Like six or seven lifetimes, it feels like.

Oh, the game? Yeah it's great. Funny. Classic lines. 11/10. Wholeheartedly recommend.

Плюсы:

Интереснейшие одиночная и кооперативная кампании
Множество новых элементов в формуле игровой механики Portal
Всегда разные, остроумные головоломки
Живой юмор, который заставит по-настоящему смеяться
Персонажи, в которых действительно веришь
Захватывающий сюжет
Отсылки к истории Half-Life
Скрупулезно проработанный дизайн уровней
Отличная оптимизация движка
Прекрасная музыка

Минусы:

Она кончается, срочно хочется дополнений с новыми уровнями или конструктор для создания собственных головоломок
best game ever i play this every day and ive played it for 125 hours so i recomend it

Portal 2 is an absolutely bloody wonderful game. This is everything a sequel should be and more. This does everything the first game does but better which tough puzzles but not so difficult you get mad. This will forever be a game i will be able to go back to as an absolute classic

Эпичное продолжение 1 части. А главное - гораздо более продолжительное (и более разнообразное, местами куда сложнее)
Бесконечное количество пользовательских уровней позволяет возвращаться в игру после её прохождения

En esta entrega de Portal 2 podemos ver una mejora gráficamente, a demás de que la historia en mi parecer es bastante disfrutable, incluso un poco mas que el 1er juego, también para quienes ya hemos jugado Portal 1 podemos notar que su secuela es todavía mas larga.
La única cosa mala que puedo decir es que la canción que escucharemos al final del juego esta vez no venia subtitulada, (a comparación del 1ro donde si venia), si sabes ingles o la canción no te interesa no tendrás ningún problema.

Game play is very smooth. 

Very challenging game and very well made. I really enjoy the challenge
One of (if not THE) best games I've ever played. Definitely recommend.
